title: First Base (group)
text:
First Base was a German Eurodance group formed in 1995. It was created by producer Michael Gleim a.k.a. DJ Wondermike and featured vocalist Kristina (Tina) Safrany a.k.a. Viktoria and rapper Michael Williams a.k.a. MC Flash. They released three singles, "Love is Paradise", "Can You Keep a Secret", and "Follow Me". The group was highly successful in Canada, with their first two singles reaching number-one on the Canadian RPM Dance Chart and the latter peaking at number 6.
